Subset a data.frame of signatures by curator

subsetByCurator.Rd

Subset a data.frame of signatures by curator

subsetByCurator(dat, curator, curator.column = "Curator")

Arguments

dat

data.frame produced by importBugSigDB

curator

curator to subset by

curator.column

name of column of curators in data.frame

Value

data.frame subsetted by curator

Examples

full.dat <- bugsigdbr::importBugSigDB()
#> Using cached version from 2022-03-10 14:01:34
fatima.dat <- subsetByCurator(full.dat, curator="Fatima Zohra")
